name: Atlantis Aura
desc: +15% Attack Speed and +10% Attack Lifesteal for all nearby allies.

name: Targeting System
desc: Activate on a target to slow them by 20% and mark them for 4 seconds. Allies who Basic Attack marked targets are healed 10 Health per hit (60 second cooldown).

name: Razor 1
desc: + 10% Attack Penetration

name: Razor 2
desc: + 35% Attack Penetration

name: Purge
desc: Activate to purge negative status effects (60 second cooldown).

name: Desperate Speed
desc: Upon falling below 50% health you gain 20% Attack Speed and 10 Move Speed until you do not deal or take damage for 5 seconds.

name: Kinetic Armor
desc: Your Basic Attacks steal 3 Attack Armor for 5 seconds (max 5 stacks).

name: Piercing 1
desc: + 10 Attack Penetration

name: Piercing 2
desc: + 15 Attack Penetration

name: Wounding
desc: Targets hit by your Basic Attacks have their healing and regeneration reduced by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

name: Will Battery
desc: Gain 4 Max Will whenever you use a skill that costs Will (3 second Cooldown). Bonus caps at + 500 bonus Will.

name: Force of Will
desc: Grants Attack Damage equal to 2% of your Max Will.

name: Intensity
desc: Toggle on to spend 3% of your current Will to deal bonus Attack Damage equal to 2 times the spent Will to all targets of single-target skills and basic attacks.

name: Slayer
desc: Your Basic Attacks deal 5% of the target's current Health as bonus Power Damage.

name: Deadly
desc: + 50% Critical Damage

name: Attack Harvest
desc: Gain 2 Attack Damage every 90 seconds and with each Champion Kill or Assist (max 80 Attack Damage).

name: Attack Harrier
desc: Basic Attacks slow your target's Move Speed by 30% decaying over 2 seconds (20% slow for Ranged Basic Attacks).

name: Marauder Burst 1
desc: + 10% Damage to Creatures

name: Marauder Burst 2
desc: + 15% Damage to Creatures

name: Marauder Burst 3
desc: + 20% Damage to Creatures

name: Marauder Burst 4
desc: + 25% Damage to Creatures

name: Marauder Edge
desc: + 10 Basic Attack Damage to Creatures (Bypasses Armor)

name: Shockwave 1
desc: Your Basic Attacks explode, dealing 10% of your total Attack Damage to other enemies nearby.

name: Shockwave 2
desc: Your Basic Attacks explode, dealing 5 damage + 30% of your total Attack Damage to other enemies nearby.

name: Shockwave 3
desc: Your Basic Attacks explode, dealing 10 damage + 50% of your total Attack Damage to other enemies nearby.

name: Attack Syphon
desc: Autoattacks heal you for 5 health.

name: Refundable
desc: You can sell this Artifact back for full value.

name: Time Anchor
desc: Activate once to record a position. Activate again within 5 seconds to return to that position (60 second cooldown).

name: Powerburst
desc: Gain 50 Power Damage for 3 seconds every 5th Basic Attack

name: Attack Damage Collector
desc: + 1 Attack Damage and 0.2% Attack Lifesteal when you collect a coin (max 30 stacks, lose half of death).

name: Response Shield
desc: Gains a shield that blocks 200 damage for 5 seconds when you fall below 30% Health.

name: Desperate Endurance
desc: Upon falling below 30% Health, gain 10% Attack and Power Lifesteal until you do not take or deal damage for 5 seconds.

name: Attack Fervor
desc: Basic Attacks grant 10% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds.

name: Frenzy
desc: Activate to gain 20 Attack Damage and 20% Attack Speed while increasing damage taken by 25% for 5 seconds (60 second cooldown).

name: Mercury's Gift
desc: Grant a 30% Move Speed buff to all nearby allies for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown).

name: Health Balance
desc: Gain +1% Health Regen per 1% of Health you are missing.

name: Investment(Stacking)
desc: Gain 3 Credits every 10 seconds.

name: Skill Block
desc: Grants a Skill Shield that prevents the damage and effects of the next enemy skill. This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

name: Burning Core
desc: Activate to deal 100 Power Damage to all nearby enemies and then, for 15 seconds, deals 40-20 decaying Power Damage per second to enemies nearby (60 second cooldown).

name: Mystical Conversion
desc: Activate to grant Power Armor equal to 25% of your Attack Armor for 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).

name: Vitality
desc: + 20% Healing Received

name: Dampening Aura
desc: - 20% Attack Speed for all nearby enemies.

name: Toughness
desc: Blocks 5 damage from Champion basic attacks.

name: Oa Aura
desc: - 15 Power Armor for all nearby enemies.

name: Protection Field
desc: Grants a temporary 40 + 10 per level Health shield to you and nearby allies that lasts for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown).

name: Olympus Aura
desc: + 15 Attack Armor, + 15 Power Armor, and + 10 Health Regen per 10 seconds for all nearby allies.

name: Bastion
desc: Activate to reduce damage taken by 25% and reduce damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).

name: Armor Collector
desc: + 1 Attack and Power Armor when you collect a coin (max 30 Attack and Power Armor, lose half on death).

name: Lazarus Effect
desc: If you would fall to 0 health, you instead become invulnerable and unable to act for 4 seconds before returning to life at 25% Health and 50% Will (5 minute cooldown).

name: Health Collector
desc: + 7.5 Health and + 1.5 Health Regen when you collect a coin (max 225 Health, 45 Health Regen, lose half on death).

name: Enforcement
desc: Gain 2% of your Max Health as additional Attack Damage.

name: Iron Will
desc: Toggle on to redirect 20% of damage taken to your Will instead.

name: Mirror Defense 1
desc: + 10% Attack Reflect

name: Mirror Defense 2
desc: + 20% Attack Reflect

name: Mirror Defense 3
desc: + 30% Attack Reflect

name: Health Harvest
desc: Gain 15 Health every 90 seconds and with each Champion Kill or Assist (max 600 Health).

name: Medisys
desc: On levelling up, regain 150 Health and Will over 10 seconds.

name: Will Force
desc: Grants Power Damage equal to 3% of your Max Will.

name: Skill Harrier
desc: Targets damaged by your skills lose 20% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds

name: Charged Armor
desc: Your Basic Attacks steal 5 Power Armor for 5 seconds (max 5 stacks)

name: Charged Attack
desc: Your Basic Attacks deal bonus Power Damage equal to 10 + 10% of your Power Damage

name: Devastating 1
desc: + 10 Power Penetration

name: Devastating 2
desc: + 15 Power Penetration

name: Disintegration
desc: Dealing damage from skills applies an effect dealing 2% of the target's current Health per second for 3 seconds

name: Will Balance
desc: Gain + 1% Will Regen per 1% of Will you are missing

name: Shrapnel
desc: After skill use, your next Basic Attack damages enemies behind your target equal to 25 + 50% of Power Damage (2 second cooldown).

name: Energy Blast
desc: Activate to deal 15% of your target's current Health as Power Damage and increase further damage you deal to them by 10% for 5 seconds (60 second cooldown).

name: Stasis Field
desc: Activate to become invulnerable, untargetable, immobile, and unable to act for 2 seconds (60 second cooldown).

name: Blood Spirit
desc: Release a restless spirit to seek out the nearest enemy champion, travelling up to 35m. If the spirit reaches them, the champion will be slowed and revealed for 5 seconds. You can release 3 spirits before you must refill by returning to base.

name: Skilled Attack 1
desc: After skill use, your next Basic Attack deals 25 + 25% Power Damage or 100% base Attack Damage (2 second cooldown). Activate to toggle.

name: Skilled Attack 2
desc: After skill use, your next Basic Attack deals 25 + 50% Power Damage or 150% base Attack Damage (2 second cooldown). Activate to toggle.

name: Qward Aura
desc: + 20 Power Damage and + 10% Power Lifesteal for all nearby allies.

name: Scanning
desc: Place a device which reveals stealthed enemies and gives vision into stealth fields within the target area for 8 seconds (60 second cooldown).

name: Arcane 1
desc: + 10% Power Penetration

name: Arcane 2
desc: + 35% Power Penetration

name: Will Restore
desc: Restores 8 Will when you collect a coin.

name: Power Damage Collector
desc: + 1.5 Power Damage when you collect a coin (max 45 Power Damage, lose half on death).

name: Power Feedback
desc: +30% Power Damage.

name: Power Harvest
desc: Gain 3 Power Damage every 90 seconds with each Champion Kill or Assist (max 120 Power Damage)

name: Bleed Tunneling
desc: Target an Environmental Object to create an entrance. Target a second Environmental Object to create an exit and open a connected portal for 15 seconds. Allies can rightclick to use the entrance and travel to the exit.

name: Health Pack
desc: Restores 150 Health over 15 seconds.

name: Will Pack
desc: Restores 150 Will over 15 seconds.

name: Tektite Vial
desc: Restores 100 Health and 100 Will over 15 seconds. Each use consumes 1 of 3 charges. Charges are refreshed when returning to base.

name: Blink Jump
desc: Activate to immediately blink to a nearby location up to 5m away (120s cooldown). Cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage.
